silenceRemover.title: Silence Remover
silenceRemover.tip1: Support common audio formats like MP3, WAV, M4A.
silenceRemover.tip2: For video we will process the audio track then remux later.
silenceRemover.tip3: Everything runs locally in your browser.
silenceRemover.previewNote: Audio preview from the selected file.
silenceRemover.autoModeNote: Auto mode is enabled. Settings are adjusted automatically.

landingPage.metaDescription: Boost your YouTube channel with our free tools. Generate hashtags, calculate CPM, remove silence, create thumbnails, and more!
landingPage.metaKeywords: YouTube tools, content creation, video editing, hashtag generator, CPM calculator, thumbnail creator
landingPage.heroSubtitle: Free tools to help you create better content, grow your audience, and increase your revenue.
landingPage.whyChooseUsDesc: Everything you need to create professional YouTube content, all in one place.

features.fastProcessingDesc: Our tools are optimized for speed, so you can create more content in less time.
features.multiLanguageDesc: Create content in multiple languages with our built-in localization support.
features.privacyFirstDesc: All processing happens in your browser - your data never leaves your computer.
features.communityDesc: Join our community of creators and get access to exclusive resources and updates.

landingPage.ourToolsDesc: Everything you need to create, optimize, and grow your YouTube channel.
landingPage.silenceRemoverDesc: Remove silent parts from your videos automatically to keep your audience engaged.
landingPage.cpmCalculatorDesc: Estimate your YouTube earnings based on your niche and target audience.
landingPage.thumbnailDownloaderDesc: Download YouTube thumbnails in all available resolutions.
landingPage.thumbnailPreviewerDesc: Preview your thumbnails on different devices and themes.
landingPage.hashtagGeneratorDesc: Generate relevant hashtags to increase your video's discoverability.
landingPage.colorPaletteGeneratorDesc: Create beautiful color palettes for your video thumbnails and branding.
landingPage.thumbnailGeneratorDesc: Create professional thumbnails with our easy-to-use generator.
landingPage.videoRephraserDesc: Rephrase your video scripts to improve clarity and engagement.
landingPage.scriptWriterDesc: Write compelling scripts for your videos with AI assistance.
landingPage.descriptionGeneratorDesc: Generate engaging descriptions for your videos to improve SEO.
landingPage.titleGeneratorDesc: Create catchy titles that increase click-through rates.
landingPage.whatUsersSayDesc: Join thousands of content creators who have transformed their YouTube channels.
landingPage.testimonial1: This tool has completely transformed how I create content for my YouTube channel. I've saved countless hours and my engagement has increased significantly.
landingPage.testimonial2: The hashtag generator alone has doubled my video views. I can't imagine creating content without these tools now.
landingPage.testimonial3: As a new creator, these tools have helped me compete with much larger channels. The thumbnail generator is a game-changer!
landingPage.frequentlyAskedDesc: Everything you need to know about our tools and services.

faqs.toolQuestion1: Are these tools really free to use?
faqs.toolAnswer1: Yes, all our tools are completely free to use. We believe in helping creators grow their channels without financial barriers.
faqs.toolQuestion2: Do I need to create an account?
faqs.toolAnswer2: No account is needed. All tools work directly in your browser with no sign-up required.
faqs.toolQuestion3: Is my data safe when using these tools?
faqs.toolAnswer3: Absolutely. All processing happens locally in your browser. We never upload your videos, images, or text to any server.
faqs.toolQuestion4: How often are new tools added?
faqs.toolAnswer4: We're constantly developing new tools based on creator feedback. Subscribe to our newsletter to stay updated on new releases.

landingPage.readyToStart: Ready to Transform Your YouTube Channel?
landingPage.readyToStartDesc: Join thousands of creators who are already using our tools to grow their channels.
landingPage.tryOurToolsDesc: Experience some of our most popular tools right here.
